findings.aboutContent: WHO WE AREWindave Digital Skills Academy is a digital skills education provider based in Abuja, Nigeria. We provide online, in-person and hybrid practical training on various digital skills such as Digital Marketing, Affiliate Marketing, Web Design/Development, Programming/Coding, Social Media Marketing, AI, virtual Assistance, Data Analytics, Mobile App Development, amongst others. We are on a mission to empower 1 Million individuals by year 2030 to acquire the digital skills needed for wealth creation and ultimately live a fulfilled life. We are passionate about wealth creation; that is why
